tagline:
I hold a PhD in Computer Engineering, along with an M.E. in Computers from Thadomal Shahani Engineering College and a B.E. in Computers from VJTI. I currently serve as Deputy Head of Department and Assistant Professor in the Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science) Department at Vasai, Maharashtra. I bring over 19 years of teaching experience and more than 10 years of industry experience as a software programmer, freelancer, and consultant.

I have conducted over 90 hands-on workshops in areas including IoT, web programming, Java programming, and machine learning. My research contributions include 51 publications in IEEE conferences, Scopus-indexed journals, and other international conferences. I have also served as session chairperson and co-chairperson for the subject Internet of Things â€“ Considerations and Applications at the IEEE international conference IndiaCom, from 2016 through 2025, held in New Delhi.

Additionally, I have authored 10 books published by Nirali Prakashan, SybGen Publications, and Technowledge Publications, covering topics such as the Internet of Things, Internet Programming, DBMS, and Computer Networks. I am also the proprietor of YPP Technologies, Vasai.
